name: Blockz VS Ballz
description:
This is a symbiosis of several games. Collect balls in the squad and attack the cubes. The more blocks the squad wins, the more points the player gains. Play without any sounds and music. Just relax while controlling the balls.

A great time killer that will allow your brain to rest.

Attention - a game without music and sound effects.

Use the mouse to control the group.
